short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to add a 'Magic Copy' option to the context menu, which copies selective parts of the image.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever wanted to copy just you and erase the background? Now you can directly in Chrome with Magic Copy! Powered by Meta's Segment Anything Model (SAM), Magic Copy edits your images right before you copy them.
